archimate:Requirement.name: IM.2.2.3b: b) restricting physical access to associated post/facsimile points and office equipment (e.g. network printers, photocopiers, facsimile machines, scanners and multi-function devices (MFDs))
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
